reg_pit.title: Retention of Fees or Commissions for the Collection of Delinquent Accounts for the Ministry of Forests and Range Regulation

change.changenote: Title BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.
change.title: Retention of Fees or Commissions for the Collection of Delinquent Accounts for the Ministry of Forests Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.

section.sectiontext: Approval is given for retention of a fee or commission by a person retained by the government to collect delinquent accounts owing to the government as represented by the Minister of Forests and Range.
